description: Judging by headlines alone, faculty members across government colleges and universities in Tamil Nadu have spent the better half of the past two years in upheaval over a plethora of issues that are yet to be resolved. A fair pay scale, timely promotions and clearance of pending increments, regularisation of the services of part-time and temporary employees, restoration of special pay provisions and revival of the old pension scheme are among their demands. description: Why has foreign policy in 2025 been full of ‘shock and surprise’? Where does India stand in its ties with the U.S.? Will issues over tariffs, visas, immigration persist in the new year? How troubling is the neighbourhood turmoil, particularly in Pakistan and Bangladesh?

title: Paragliding pilot dies during takeoff at Bir Billing; tourist survives
description: A tandem paragliding pilot died in a crash shortly after takeoff at Bir Billing, marking the third fatality this year. The incident has raised concerns about safety standards and pilot working conditions. An inquiry is underway, with authorities emphasizing strict adherence to SOPs and passenger screening.

title: Unnao rape case: CBI cites Advani judgment to seek Sengar bail nixing
description: The CBI has urged the Supreme Court to overturn a Delhi High Court decision that excluded MLA Kuldeep Singh Sengar from being prosecuted under the POCSO Act. Citing the L K Advani case, the CBI argued that lawmakers, as public servants, should face stricter penalties for offenses involving children, emphasizing their public trust and authority.

title: What are the signals from the Indian economy? | Explained
description: What measures have the government taken to boost demand and growth?

title: Tattoo affair: Bengaluru man gets life term for murdering wife; strangled her when sleeping pills didn’t work
description: A husband was sentenced to life imprisonment for murdering his wife after she discovered a tattoo of another woman on his arm. He drugged her with sleeping pills mixed in beer, and when she survived, he strangled her. Circumstantial evidence, including CCTV footage and witness testimonies, led to his conviction.

title: The making of Galileo
description: Twenty years ago, on December 28, 2005, Giove-A (Galileo In-Orbit Validation Element-A  for those who like their expansions) was launched, one of two demonstration satellites to test and validate Galileo technologies in orbit. Ten days ago, on December 17, 2025, two Galileo satellites lifted off, further strengthening Europe’s Galileo constellation. A.S.Ganesh tells you more about this Galileo and what it is up to…

title: Elliotte Friedman warns Maple Leafs face tough talks amid inconsistency
description: The Toronto Maple Leafs are going through a rough patch with inconsistent performances and growing pressure on leadership. Elliotte Friedman has said the team needs to act quickly to improve consistency and accountability. How the Leafs play in the coming games will show if they can get back on track and avoid a difficult stretch this season.

title: Brittany Mahomes shifts focus as Patrick Mahomes earns praise off the field
description: NFL titans Robert Kraft and Gayle Benson, both billionaires, showcase contrasting paths to sports ownership. Kraft built a vast empire through diverse investments before acquiring the Patriots, while Benson inherited and expanded her late husband's franchises, the Saints and Pelicans. Their financial journeys highlight distinct strategies for wealth accumulation and franchise management.

title: Frank Lampard & Christine Lampard net worth 2025: Football, TV success
description: Former Chelsea star Frank Lampard, a decorated player and manager, has achieved significant success in football. His wife, Christine Lampard, is a highly recognized and versatile TV presenter. Despite their public profiles, the couple prioritizes their children, maintaining a combined net worth estimated at £100 million through their respective careers and investments.
